page.prototype: .SaveItemToFile as L (SourcePath as C, TargetPath as C)

argument.name: SourcePath
argument.description: The source path on the local machine (e.g. server or desktop application.)

argument.name: TargetPath
argument.description: The destination path in the Storage container.

page.description: Copies a file from the local machine to the Storage container.
page.example:
dim CallResult as CallResult dim Container as A5Storage::DataContainer = null_value()
CallResult = A5Storage::DataContainer::Open(Container, "Provider='Disk';Container='c:\A5Webroot';") ? CallResult.Success = .T.
? Container.SaveItemToFile("MyItempath/MyItem.jpg", "c:\temp\MyItem.jpg") = .T.
